original_text: And the Pharisees went forth, and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him, how they might destroy him.
korean_text: 바리새인들이 나가서 곧 헤롯당과 함께 어떻게 하여 예수를 죽일까 의논하니라

sentences.original_text: and straightway took counsel with the Herodians

sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 어떻게 그를 멸할 수 있을지
